sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STRATAGEM, in the art of war, any device for deceiving and surprising an enemy. The ancients dealt very much in stratagems, the moderns wage war more openly. Poly√¶nus and Frontinus, the former a Greek, the latter a Latin writer, have each left a treatise on stratagems of war.
